meanings.definition: Having a shield-shaped structure attached to the stalk near the center.
meanings.sent1: The peltate leaf was firmly attached to the stem.
meanings.sent2: The plant had peltate leaves that provided ample shade.
meanings.sent3: The peltate shield protected the tiny insect from the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her umbrella looked peltate, shielding her from the sun's rays.
meanings.sent5: The shield's peltate shape made it stand out in the forest.

meanings.definition: Having a shield-shaped leaf or structure attached to the stalk near the center.
meanings.sent1: The peltate design of the leaf caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The flower had a beautiful peltate petal at its center.
meanings.sent3: The peltate leaf danced in the wind, looking like a tiny shield.
meanings.sent4: The peltate structure of the plant resembled a protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: The shield's peltate pattern was unlike anything seen before.
